Room.Name: Main Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking in the Main Hallway, just east of the Main Chapel.
Room.LongDescription: The hallway opens into a large chapel to the west where anyone may enter to pray, study or just rest under the watchful eye of Artemis. There is a door to the north which reads "Priestess' Quarters". There is another door on the south which reads "Meditation Chamber". The chapel is relatively deserted at this time, but shows a bit of movement occasionally.
